title: piri prawns and harissa couscous
description: Note: If the baharat spice mix is unavailable, make your own blend of black pepper, paprika, ground cumin, ground coriander, freshly grated nutmeg and ground cinnamon and keep the unused spice blend in an airtight jar.
ingredients: 2 red chillies, seeds removed, roughly chopped
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
12 very large prawns, shells removed but tails left on, cleaned
1 tsp baharat spice mix (available from Middle Eastern stores and some supermarkets)
